name: Songs of Araiah: Re-Mastered Edition
description:
"In a fantasy land ruled by a dictator, a boy runs away from home to make a pact of eternal servitude to a mysterious vampire lady in exchange for immortality. But what really awaits in the mansion at the base of Hitely Mountain?"

Dive into a magical world in this remastered edition of the award-winning, kinetic, indie visual novel, and witness a curious relationship unfold in the most unexpected of ways. You will find great comedy, suspense, and excitement in this adventure-filled, dramatic/romantic multimedia story.New in this special edition:
  • A revised story and dialogue
  • All new background art
  • New character sprites
  • Upgraded and extra visual effects
  • Additional sound effects
  • New, minimalistic UI
  • Autosave feature
  • Higher resolution graphics
Bonus content:
  • Soundtrack
  • Wallpapers
  • Music video
  • Trailer

Both windowed and fullscreen modes are supported. On Windows, press the F11 key on your keyboard to switch between the two modes. Your progress is autosaved (press CTRL + BACKSPACE to restart/reset).
